mapper.select: select * from(select P1.Record_id,P.CHINESE_NAME as name, p.C_COUNT as count,p.C_PRICE as price,p1.PRIVE_TYPE as stata from PRESCRIPTIONS P inner join PRESCRIPTION P1 on p.PRES_ID = P1.PRES_NO)rec where rec.Record_id = #{record_id} and rec.stata = 0

select * from(select C.CHECKOUT_ID as RECORD_ID,C1.CHECKOUT_RESULT as name,c.CHECKOUT_PRICE as price ,C.CHECKOUT_STATE as state from CHECKOUT C inner join changePart C1 on C.Checkout_no = C.Checkout_no union all select CHECKOUT_ID as RECORD_ID , EXAMINE_METHOD as name,EXAMINE_LOOK as price ,EXAMINE_STATE as state from examine)rec
WHERE rec.RECORD_ID= #{record_id} and rec.state = 0
